phrasetype.phrase: Specify the amount of time you wish to retain push notification data that users can access. Note: longer times specified will require more storage to retain data and database performance may be affected as well.
Formerly known as Push Key. This key is now required for secure connection between your community and Tapatalk server. Features such as Push Notification and Single Sign-On requires this key to work.

Basic Message - Do not include post content and images preview in Push Notifications.
Rich Message - Includes post content and images preview in Push Notifications.
This field is required if you select "Redirect to External Registration URL" under "Registration Options". You do not need to include the forum root URL.
By enabling StopForumSpam integration, new user registration from Tapatalk app and/or from web will be screened with StopForumSpam database to prevent existing black-listed spammers.

This option enables you to specify user groups to be excluded from being served advertising. Each user group name should be separated by a comma, for example, "3,11,6" which means only users who belong to groups 3,6 and 11 will not be shown ads.
This option automatically approve verified Tapatalk member without the need of moderation or other additional steps.
Enable hard delete post and topic for authorized user.

This setting is for advanced users. If you installed the Tapatalk plug-in into a custom folder by manually changing the name of the name of the default "mobiquo" folder, you must specify the custom folder name here. You will also need to specify the custom folder name AND path in your Tapatalk forum owner account as well. (http://tapatalk.com/landing.php)
Hide forums you don't want them to be listed in Tapatalk app.
Deep-Linking Thread from Link in Facebook App.
Deep-Linking Thread from Google Search Result.
Deep-Linking Thread from Link in Twitter App.
Tapatalk users on your forum can get instant notification with new reply of subscribed topic and new pm if this setting was enabled.
Prevent Tapatalk users from creating new topics in the selected sub-forums. This feature is useful for forums that require additional information or credentials that Tapatalk does not yet support.

Verified Tapatalk users signed in from Facebook, Google or verified email address can register your forum natively in-app. COPPA and additional custom fields are also supported, althought we strongly recommend to keep the custom fields to absolute minimal to make registration easier on mobile.
You can assign users registered with Tapatalk to specific user groups(filling usergroup id). If you do not assign them to a specific group, they will be assigned a default group.

Ability to match and replace thread content using PHP preg_replace function(http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.preg-replace.php). E.g. "'pattern', 'replacement'" . You can define more than one replace rule on each line.
Enable this to support VBSEO like mode with Tapatalk. Disable this if VBSEO is not an installed add-on in your forum.

This is a master-switch to allow Tapatalk to retrieve email address from your registration system for use various notifications features. For example, an email notification to newly registered members to receive a email link to download your branded app or the Tapatalk app, or to send members a weekly "Trending Topics" newsletter to help drive members back to your forum. Details about the email settings can be found by logging in at to your Tapatalk Console at Siteowners.Tapatalk.com. This feature is disabled by default.
